title: Biden Beam
desc:
Post 842
- Choose a player.
- The targeted players turn is skipped until a <:blue:1106234079055200378> or <:white:1107514189574045726> card is played.
- if a <:blue:1106234079055200378> card is played first, they are frozen a second time.
- if a <:white:1107514189574045726> card is played first, they draw a <:blue:1106234079055200378> card.
